_meanings:
{@--2@} To be fetched or brought
near.

{@--7@} Conveyed or 
effected by decoration or ornamentation,
one of the 4 kinds of {#aBinaya#} <ab>q. v.</ab>

{@--1@} Any disease to be 
treated by means of extracting.

{@--4@} The 
ornamentative part of the drama, such
as dress, decorations &c.
